summary:
I am fascinated by the analysis and solving different puzzles. In order to do that I am always interested in stories of organizations and people. I enjoy working with teams and getting the best possible results and solutions by implementing new technologies. Above all, I love to discover and develop different kinds of talents in people.

Some of my stories involve improving the planning of twenty thousand employees, deliver new business process models based op ERP systems, improve athlete success by enhancing their 360-degree data insight or get better results from logistical operations.

I am an experienced managing consultant with the passion of adding business value. My primary goal is bridging the gap between what the organization requires and what is feasible and available on the IT and personal domain. Since I have been working within various government and private organizations I am familiar with different cultures, challenges and political dimensions.

Specialties: ERP/SCM implementations, Service Management, Quality Management, Personnel en Logistics planning, Project and line management, Business Proces Management

certifications.name: Enterprise Agile: Disciplined Agile (DA) versus Spotify

Selling Consultancy and commercial management
Developing propositions and solutions,
Competence group leader on different solutions,

Our units deliver deep knowledge and expertise at the areas of business architecture, data-driven organizing, business platforms, security and privacy, digital acceleration and transformation and high performance teams
